channel.title: What is Peer Learning?
channel.description:
When it comes to getting education right in topics and places where the standard stuff just doesn’t work, Peer Learning has been the answer for us.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at http://peerlearning.is/what-is-peer-learning/
